title: (x) Technics - (similar to) Egyptian 505 {Mike Y}
content:
Hi!   
   
I'm a new user, seeking the font that corresponds to the Technics logotype. If it is of any use, I can say that Technics is an audio manufacturer, specializing in the best turntables ever known to humankind. Thank you for your help!
author: teplotaxl

comments.content:
Hi Flebert, Welcome to Typophile. It is helpful to us if you show us the type you want identified, so this time I found a Technics logo to post for you. It looks a bit like [Egyptian 505 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818222647/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/egyptian-505/egyptian505-bold/testdrive.html?s=Technics&p=48) to me, or some similar slab serif:   
 ![Technics logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818222647im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42183.gif)

Thanks for the image, Mike! It's funny, because that's just the image that I was about to post!   
I'll look for Egyptian 505 Bold.   
Thank you very much, again.   
Ethan

This has come up before ( [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818222647/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27526.html?1078173452)).   
   
Incidentally, I think I've figured out how to search the "unsearchable" archives of Typophile: Use Google's option to search within a specific domain instead of Typophile's built-in search. I wonder if this is how James Gareth does it?
